ModMetaData.name: [T] MoreBedsVanilla
ModMetaData.author: Telkir
ModMetaData.description:
Spruce up your colonists' bedrooms with a selection of different colours for all sizes of bed.
‚óè Beds of all sizes now have red, yellow, green, blue, and purple variants
Note: Don't enable this mod as well as T-MoreBedsCloth; just pick one. Note: New beds added by this mod do not recolour when set to prisoner or medical use.
